prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Melissa Gale
mes:
I have provided you with a horary chart that I have drawn up specifically asking: What is the true nature and depth of my emotional state regarding Stefan's potentially forthcoming communication today?

Stefan should be represented by the 9th house (foreign connection) and Me by the Ascendant.

I've provided a cross reference guide to help identify the houses concerning him due to his 9th house representation.

Please start by listing all relevant chart data for interpretation (ie. transits, aspects, patterns, etc.) from the horary chart using horary principles only. Then I will document them for the actual interpretations.

Remember to follow your directives and maintain accuracy to what is shown in the chart data. Think step by step taking a methodical approach.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Below is a detailed list of the raw horary chart data for your inquiry, organized by category as a basis for interpretation. This data is presented solely on the horary principles and without extrapolation:

1. PLANETARY POSITIONS (with exact degrees and signs):
 • Sun: 14°58′ Aquarius
 • Moon: 21°45′ Aries
 • Mercury: 10°41′ Aquarius
 • Venus: 29°25′ Pisces
 • Mars (retrograde): 19°44′ Cancer
 • Jupiter (retrograde): 11°16′ Gemini
 • Saturn: 17°42′ Pisces
 • Uranus: 23°16′ Taurus
 • Neptune: 28°02′ Pisces
 • Pluto: 2°08′ Aquarius
 • North Node (retrograde): 29°43′ Pisces
 • Chiron: 19°34′ Aries
 • Ascendant: 4°11′ Pisces
 • Midheaven (MC): 16°29′ Sagittarius
 • Imum Coeli (IC): 16°29′ Gemini

2. MAJOR ASPECTS (with orbs noted):
 • Mars square Chiron (orb: 0°)
 • MC opposition IC (orb: 0°)
 • Venus conjunct North Node (orb: 0°)
 • Saturn square IC (orb: 1°)
 • Saturn square MC (orb: 1°)
 • Neptune conjunct North Node (orb: 1°)
 • Venus conjunct Neptune (orb: 1°)
 • Mercury trine Jupiter (orb: 1°)
 • Sun sextile MC (orb: 2°)
 • Moon square Mars (orb: 2°)
 • Moon conjunct Chiron (orb: 2°)
 • Mars trine Saturn (orb: 2°)
 • Sun trine IC (orb: 2°)
 • Chiron sextile IC (orb: 3°)
 • Pluto sextile North Node (orb: 3°)
 • Venus sextile Pluto (orb: 3°)
 • Chiron trine MC (orb: 3°)
 • Sun trine Jupiter (orb: 3°)
 • Mars sextile Uranus (orb: 4°)
 • Sun conjunct Mercury (orb: 4°)
 • Uranus sextile Neptune (orb: 5°)
 • Moon sextile IC (orb: 5°)
 • Sun sextile Chiron (orb: 5°)
 • Jupiter opposition MC (orb: 5°)
 • Jupiter conjunct IC (orb: 5°)
 • Moon trine MC (orb: 5°)
 • Saturn sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Venus sextile Uranus (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury sextile MC (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Saturn (orb: 6°)
 • Mercury trine IC (orb: 6°)
 • Jupiter square Ascendant (orb: 7°)
 • Mercury conjunct Pluto (orb: 8°)

3. PATTERNS IDENTIFIED:
 • T-Square involving:
  – MC in Sagittarius (16°)
  – Saturn in Pisces (17°)
  – IC in Gemini (16°)
  – Jupiter in Gemini (11°)
 • Cradle pattern involving:
  – MC in Sagittarius (16°)
  – IC in Gemini (16°)
  – Chiron in Aries (19°)
  – Sun in Aquarius (14°58′)

4. HOUSE PLACEMENTS:
 • 1st House (Ascendant at 4° Pisces): Contains Moon, Venus, Saturn, Neptune, North Node, and Chiron
 • 2nd House (starts at 24° Aries): Contains Uranus
 • 3rd House (starts at 26° Taurus): Contains Jupiter
 • 4th House (starts at 16° Gemini)
 • 5th House (starts at 3° Cancer): Contains Mars
 • 6th House (starts at 25° Cancer)           [Representing Stefan’s 9th House per the given cross-reference]
 • 7th House (starts at 4° Virgo)
 • 8th House (starts at 24° Libra)
 • 9th House (starts at 26° Scorpio)           [Representing Stefan’s 12th House per the given cross-reference]
 • 10th House (starts at 16° Sagittarius)
 • 11th House (starts at 3° Capricorn)
 • 12th House (starts at 25° Capricorn): Contains Sun, Mercury, and Pluto

5. SPECIAL FEATURES & STRUCTURAL NOTES:
 • The Moon is a waxing crescent, indicating emerging energy.
 • The chart shape is a Bowl with a dominant mutable quality among the inner planets.
 • Most planets are located in the bottom left quadrant; the top right quadrant is empty.
 • Jupiter and the IC are located at the Nadir.
 • The sextile aspect occurs most frequently (11 instances).
 • Moon in Aries and Mars in Cancer are in mutual reception.
 • Neptune in Pisces occupies the sign of its rulership.

6. CROSS-REFERENCE FOR STEFAN:
 • Per the provided mapping, with Stefan represented by a 9th house focus, his significators are aligned as follows:
  – Chart’s 6th House corresponds to Stefan’s 9th House
  – Additional cross-reference details:
   • 1st House ⇨ Stefan’s 4th House
   • 2nd House ⇨ Stefan’s 5th House
   • 3rd House ⇨ Stefan’s 6th House
   • 4th House ⇨ Stefan’s 7th House
   • 5th House ⇨ Stefan’s 8th House
   • 7th House ⇨ Stefan’s 10th House
   • 8th House ⇨ Stefan’s 11th House
   • 9th House ⇨ Stefan’s 12th House
   • 10th House ⇨ Stefan’s 1st House
   • 11th House ⇨ Stefan’s 2nd House
   • 12th House ⇨ Stefan’s 3rd House

These are the foundational data points that will serve as the basis for interpreting the true nature and depth of your emotional state regarding the possibility of Stefan’s communication today. Provide confirmation or additional details if needed.

name: Melissa Gale
mes: Thank you, Madame. Please, proceed to interpretation.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Based on your horary chart, your emotional state regarding Stefan’s forthcoming communication is a blend of intense vulnerability, idealism, and guarded caution.

The cluster in your Ascendant (1st House) shows that your feelings are front and center—your Moon in Aries reveals passionate, immediate emotional responses, yet its square with Mars indicates inner tension and potential for conflict or irritation. Moon’s conjunction with Chiron further points to an underlying emotional wound that is resurfacing, suggesting that past hurts are influencing your present sensitivity.

Venus, in both its conjunction with Neptune and with the North Node in Pisces, adds a layer of romantic idealism and a deep wish for a spiritually meaningful connection. However, Saturn also residing in Pisces in your 1st house injects a note of restraint, a need to guard yourself against repeating past disappointments. The overall mutable quality in this cluster shows that your emotional state is changeable; you are open to new communication while caution is advised by internal insecurities.

Additional factors reinforce this complexity. The T-square involving Saturn, your Midheaven, and the IC indicates tension between your outer ambitions/expectations and deep-seated personal feelings. Mercury’s trine with Jupiter offers a glimmer of broader perspective and optimism, yet the shadow of Jupiter square Saturn suggests that your hopes are somewhat limited by lingering concerns.

Thus, the chart suggests that your emotional depths are stirring with anticipation for Stefan’s message, yet tempered by unresolved wounds and a cautious instinct. Your heart yearns for clarity and connection, but a part of you remains wary of potential hurt.

Interpret this as an invitation to address your inner pains while remaining open to change if communication does indeed arrive.
